title: Jr. Front End Developer
description: Custom website design and development per client's requests. Help the clients remodel and optimize their site. The main tools used in the work are HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, RWD, and CMS.

title: Office Supervisor
description: Take responsibility for hundreds of cases. Ensure the quality of the treatment. Set up cloud office for the company. Maintain the hardware and software, and solve IT issues for the office.

title: Case Manager
description: Collaborate and communicate with the Regional Center, clinicians, and patients for the treatment. Track the records and follow up with the current report.
